newsitem.title: JAPAN: IBJ says appraisal loss Y102.98 bln as of end-96/7. [corrected 07:54 gmt]
newsitem.headline: IBJ says appraisal loss Y102.98 bln as of end-96/7. [corrected 07:54 gmt]

text.p: Industrial Bank of Japan Ltd said on Wednesday that its appraisal loss on its securities holdings stood at 102.8 billion yen as of March 31, 1997.

The bank also said that it estimates its problem loans totalled 1.08 trillion yen as of the end of March 1997, down from 1.28 trillion yen at the end of September. (Corrects to show that figure was for problem loans at the end of September.)
